#K2K beam
beam_type=0
beam energy = 0 4000 0.102189781022 0.953771289538 1.95133819951 2.70559610706 3.92214111922 5.6496350365 7.54744525547 9.22627737226 10.5158150852 11.4647201946 12.1946472019 12.3163017032 11.9270072993 11.1727493917 10.102189781 8.83698296837 7.49878345499 6.20924574209 5.0900243309 4.04379562044 3.21654501217 2.51094890511 1.95133819951 1.48905109489 1.12408759124 0.856447688564 0.661800486618 0.491484184915 0.394160583942 0.296836982968 0.199513381995 0.150851581509 0.126520681265 0.102189781022 0.102189781022 0.102189781022 0.0778588807786 0.0778588807786 0.0778588807786 0.029197080292
# the PDG code of the beam particle
# 12 - nu_e    
# 14 - nu_mu
# 16 - nu_tau
# -12 - anti_nu_e
# -14 - anti_nu_mu
# -16 - anti_nu_tau

beam_particle      = 14

# The direction of the beam given as a 3 coordinates of the vector alligned with the beam

beam_direction     = 0 0 1
